title: "SV Polytechnic to get Centre of Excellence for computer vision"
excerpt: "SV Polytechnic college in Bhopal is set to get a Centre of Excellence for computer vision with the assistance of IIT Delhi. The other two cities in MP, Jabalpur and Ujjain, will also open Centers of Excellence in the fields of artificial intelligence,"
